description: When Anthony Moore comes home to find that both his hired hands are fucking instead of cleaning, he realizes there are one of two lessons to learn, depending on how you look at it. Either you could say, 'Don't hire such hot guys to clean your house or else you'll find them fucking,' or you could say, 'Always hire hot guys to clean your house because there's a good chance you'll find them fucking'. And after Dante Martin and Jamie Steel get done with him, it's a safe bet which lesson Anthony will learn. Enjoy!
series: NDB - 5005 - Anthony Moore, Dante Martin & Jamie Steel
title: Maid For Three
